mapper.insert: insert into blog_inform (in_id, in_content, in_informtime, in_read, in_user_id) values (#{inId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inInformtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inRead}, #{inUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select in_id, in_content, in_informtime, in_user_id from blog_inform
